name: translucency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being translucent (= almost transparent, in an attractive way): Glass can have different levels of transparency and translucency. When it was exposed to sunlight, the stone lost its translucency.
More examplesFewer examplesFry the onions in a shallow pan until they have lost their translucency.The artist has sanded the pieces unevenly so that their translucency is variable.When the flesh is white and all traces of translucency are gone, the fish will be fully cooked.It is the bone that gives bone china its translucency.
